0.1.name: wordpress/wordpress-roadmap
0.1.description:
The WordPress Roadmap plugin allows you to create multiple, dynamic roadmaps that can be used to display your development progress of a product (think http://interstateapp.com for WordPress).

Features:

  • Create multiple roadmaps
  • Add an ulimited number of items per roadmap
  • Simple backend UI for managing your roadmaps
  • Built in theme template for displaying roadmaps
  • Uses custom post types so is easily "theme-able"
